params._ERC20: address of the ERC20 token contract
params._amount: amount of the ERC20 token to be deposited
params._data: information to be interpreted by L2

returns._0: hash of input generated by deposit

executeRollupsVoucher(bytes).details: can only be called by the Output contract

params._data: data with information necessary to execute voucher

erc20Deposit(address,uint256,bytes).notice: deposit an amount of a generic ERC20 in the portal contract and create tokens in L2
